originalText.text: I just want to say that this funeral home was very efficient. Jenny was helpful with the process of cremating my cousin and was available to answer questions that my family might have. I literally called on Friday inquiring about the cremation for my cousin and that same day I was able to have the services paid for and over with. Myrna was also very kind in helping me with the remaining portion of finalizing getting the ashes to where they needed to go. I hope I never need the services any time soon but this definitely checks the boxes of business I would return to if it was needed. I would recommend the services and give them 5 stars. Thank you for making this process easy. Our family thanks you!

originalText.text: I would like say thank you to the entire staff of the International Funeral services for their professionalism, respect and care they provided me and my family with the passing of both of my parents. First with our father almost  2 years ago and now with our mother. From the removed of their bodies, the viewing and the burial. They were fantastic. A big big big thank you to Jenny. Always available to the family and always willing to accommodate us with so much empathy and caring; God bless you. Great job work with both of their bodies. Both look beautiful during their viewing. I would never hesitate to use their services for the funeral services of any of my loved ones!!!

originalText.text:
Dealing with the death of a loved one is difficult enough but add the complexity of doing this in a different country.  International Funeral Service managed and executed the whole process seamlessly and professional.  They took us through every step of the process and allowed us the time and space to be with our father until the very end.

We cannot thank Patrick, Jennifer, Jenny and Joe enough for the support and care they provided.

International Funeral Service managed and executed the whole process seamlessly and professional. We cannot thank Patrick, Jennifer, Jenny and Joe enough for the support and care they provided.

originalText.text: International Funeral Service is unmatched when it comes to the delicate business of caring for deceased loved ones. Jenny and Myrna were professional, understanding and they honored my family's cultural beliefs and practices. My mother looked as beautiful as memory would allow which speaks to the mortician's skills. I wish I could say more but what I can say for now is thank you for the respect and consideration shown and may God bless you all and this place of business. If you care about your loved ones, IFS is where you should bring them.

originalText.text: Pat and his team are excellent in this tough environment as they are comforting, empathetic, supportive & accommodating to the community. Quality customer service. Truly recommend this service. Extremely satisfied with the quality of work.
